main event: On April 7, 1967, a witness reported seeing a bright reddish-white light that was flashing and pulsating in the western sky for approximately 15 minutes.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be about 10 degrees above the horizon and appeared stationary during the observation., The witness expressed an unusual feeling about the object they could not identify., There was no physical evidence collected following the sighting., The initial report suggested a photograph might have been taken, but it was not provided., Observers in the area reported seeing similar lights on different occasions.
sighted object: a bright reddish-white light in the sky
witness description: A civilian observer who reported the sighting.
